page.title: 05Children's Activities
page.content: We did a survey and found the Youth Club for 8-13 year olds was the most popular.For 45p.we play games three times a week.The Methodist Shell Group on Thursdays is good for outings to places of interest.The Dance Centre at Lee Green teaches Latin American, Ballroom & Disco Dancing.Some of our pupils go to Brownies,Beavers,Cubs, Scouts Guides & Boys'Brigade.Judo and Taikwando is popular.Some children go to Swimming Club. Some of the games we play are marbles conkers,hide and seek,hopscotch.Freeze and What time is it Mr.Wolf? are to do with statues one pupil tricking others into moving.Ball games are volleyball football,rounders,netball, two-baller. There are various forms of Tig such as Tiggy Helper,Tiggy High (or Low) and Poison.In Cannonball a ball and pegs are used to start a game of chasey.
